body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

---

## What happened

Open a Flutter project in IntelliJ, 
then open a terminal in IntelliJ.

Update the flutter framework through 
`flutter upgrade`
this crashes the plugin.

`flutter upgrade` finnishes and 
## Version information

IntelliJ IDEA `2021.1.2 RC` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 57.0.5` • Dart plugin `211.7233`

Flutter 2.2.2 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision d79295af24 (4 days ago) • 2021-06-11 08:56:01 -0700
Engine • revision 91c9fc8fe0
Tools • Dart 2.13.3

## Exception

Trying to reset custom component in a presentation

```
java.lang.Throwable
```

comment_data.body:
Thanks for the detailed repro steps! This is just a (rather annoying) LOG message, and does not affect the plugin behavior.

Fixed in #5577

title: Flutter Plugin dies when `flutter upgrade` is run
